SEARCH
Package dao

Class ReservationDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.ReservationDAO
public class ReservationDAO extends Object
ReservationDAO provides methods to manage book reservations in the library system. These methods include adding a reservation, checking if a loan exists for a book, deleting a reservation, retrieving the next reservation, checking if a user has a reservation for a particular book, and getting all reservations.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReservationDAO

      public ReservationDAO()

  • Method Details

    • getConnection

      public Connection getConnection() throws SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the database using the provided JDBC URL, user, and password.
      Returns:
      Connection object representing an active connection to the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs or the URL is null

    • addBookToReservation

      public void addBookToReservation(User user, Book book) throws SQLException
      Adds a book to the user's reservation list in the database. If the book is currently on loan, the reservation date is set to one week after the loan's due date. Otherwise, the reservation date is set to the current date.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who wants to reserve the book
      book - the book to be reserved
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • isLoanExist

      public LocalDate isLoanExist(Book book) throws SQLException
      Checks whether there are any existing loans for the specified book. Retrieves all reservation dates for the book from the database, and returns the most recent reservation date.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to check for existing loans
      Returns:
      the most recent reservation date if loans exist; null otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • deleteReservation

      public void deleteReservation(int userId, int bookId, LocalDate reservationDate) throws SQLException
      Deletes a reservation from the database based on the user ID, book ID, and reservation date.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      bookId - the unique identifier of the book
      reservationDate - the date on which the reservation was made
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getNextReservation

      public void getNextReservation(Book book) throws SQLException
      Processes the next reservation for the specified book. Retrieves the oldest reservation from the reservations table, creates a loan for the user who made the reservation, and then deletes the reservation.
      Parameters:
      book - the book for which the next reservation is to be processed
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • isHaveReservation

      public boolean isHaveReservation(User user, Book book) throws SQLException
      Checks if the specified user has a reservation for the specified book.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to check for a reservation
      book - the book to check for a reservation
      Returns:
      true if the user has a reservation for the book, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllReservations

      public List<Loan> getAllReservations() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reservations from the database and returns them as a list of Loan objects.
      Returns:
      a list of Loan objects representing all reservations in the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
